name: healthcare-payments-blockchain-fhir-demo
description: Healthcare Payments in Blockchain FHIR Demo

scripts.cc:start: f() { npm run cc:package; npm run cc:install; }; f
scripts.cc:upgrade: f() { npm run cc:package -- fhir org1; hurl upgrade $1 node $2  -P ./chaincode-fhir; }; f
scripts.cc:package: f() { npm run lerna:build; chaincode-manager --config ./chaincode.config.json --output ./chaincode-fhir package; }; f
scripts.cc:install: f() { hurl install fhir node -P ./chaincode-fhir; }; f
